choices: All the food they can find
Ninjas stuffed with food, then eaten
1.content: So then, let's get started. How will these two gain?
1.title: Intro

11.content: Alright then, food it is! How big will they start off?
11.title: All the food they can find

12.content: Okay then, big tasty ninjas! How big will our hungry ninjas start off?
12.title: Tasty ninjas

13.content: All the food they could ever want, huh? Give them ninjas AND food. Guess they're gonna get pretty big, hm? Well, lets see just how big they're gonna start!
13.title: Hungry, hungry ninjas

choices: All the ramen left at the stand!
131.content:
Kiba yawned as he sat at the Ramen stand. Choji was sitting next to him, stuffing his face with noodles. The Inuzuka had expected it to happen, really.

The fatter ninja had invited Kiba out to lunch in celebration of the dog ninja's 18th birthday. Kiba figured he could always do with a free meal, so it wasn't much of a problem for him.

"Mmmf... Kiba... Why aren't you eating anything?" Choji questioned, a large stack of empty bowls next to him.

The Inuzuka had already had two, but it was clear that didn't mean a whole lot in his companion's books.

"I... Well, I did..."

"C'mon! Eat more, mutt. Celebrate your birthday, why don't you?"

"I don't know Choji..."

Kiba laughed a bit at his friend, admiring his large belly a bit. He reached out one of his tanned hands, and gently rubbed it while he ate.

"Heheh... You sure, Kiba?" Choji asked, not seeming to mind having his flab rubbed at.

"Well, I don't know..." replied Kiba.

"Come on! I saw you admiring my body a bit... You know you want to be big like I am..."

"Haha... Well... In that case..." Kiba began, "I guess I'll have..."
131.title: A Budding Glutton

choices: "Fatten up some of the others, then eat them whole."
"Hit every restaurant in the village and eat everything they've got."
1312.content:
"...all the ramen left here!" Kiba decided. Without waiting for Choji's reaction, he called out, "Hey! Bring out all the ramen you got!" As his meal was being prepared, Kiba smirked toothily. "Naruto's not the only one who can put it away..."

Choji blinked as several bowls were brought out to Kiba. His stomach growled hungrily, but decided to wait and see how Kiba would make out. He might have a fellow glutton on his hands...

Grinning, Kiba grabbed a pair of chopsticks and began slurping the noodles up. He went at it crazily, not stopping for a second. Every time he finished a bowl, a new one was brought out. As Kiba downed 6 bowls, Choji looked on, mildly impressed.

As Kiba continued feasting, his stomach began growing, bulging slightly with every bowl of ramen he consumed. Choji looked on, now very intrigued, as Kiba's stomach steadily grew.

After at least 30 minutes, Kiba finished his last bowl and downed the broth, slamming it down on the counter. He sighed in contentment and leaned back, smiling and closing his eyes. His stomach was now a rather large bulge pressing against his black jacket, which Kiba began rubbing with a hand. Kiba laughed.

"Heh, I'd like to see Naruto beat that!" the dog-nin sighed happily. He stood up and stretched, turning to Choji. "So, Choji, whaddaya think?" he asked, gesturing to his belly.

Choji scrutinized his fellow ninja's gut. "Hmm... fine, but you could do better." Chuckling at Kiba's shocked expression Choji left his seat. "Tell you what, I'll meet you again for lunch tomorrow."

Kiba blinked. "Really?" He stretched and yawned; the massive, fattening meal had made him a bit sleepy. "What didja' have in mind?"

Smirking, Choji replied. "It's a surprise."

Jaw dropping, Kiba protest. "Hey, what the hell? Why won't you..."

Choji waved him off. "Trust me, you'll love it."

This seemed to placate Kiba slightly, but he still shrugged. "Eh, alright. Well, talk to ya tomorrow, Choji; I need to go get Akamaru from the vet." He began walking off, arms behind his head.

Choji watched Kiba leave with a smile. "I hope you're really hungry tomorrow, Kiba..."

The next day...

Kiba walked toward Choji in the village square, Akamaru at his side. He smiled as he walked up to the corpulent ninja, his own stomach still very large and prominent, and still pressing against his jacket.

"So, Choji, what're we doing for lunch?" Kiba asked the other ninja.
1312.title: All the ramen left at the stand!

choices: Let's go for that Konohamaru kid!"
13121.content:
"Well," Choji began, " I was really hungry today, so..."

Frowning, Kiba growled. Why couldn't Choji just tell him?

He got his answer sooner than he expected. Choji leaned in towards Kiba's ear, and whispered:

"I figured we'd find some of the others, plump 'em up, then eat them when they're nice and big."

Kiba gasped, stumbling back and nearly tripping over Akamaru. "W-what?! The hell are you talking about, Choji? We can't do that, that's cannibalism!"

Choji chuckled, shaking his head; he'd expected this reaction. "Relax, Kiba, it's not as bad as you think."

"Choji," Kiba growled, "How can it not be bad? We're eating our comrades and friends alive!" He shuddered at the thought of doing such a thing to Hinata, or heck, even Shino...

Choji didn't seem bothered in the least. "What I mean is," he began, thumping his stomach, "Is that they'll be alive even after we've eaten them."

This brought Kiba up short. "Wha...?"

"It'd be better to just show you," Choji offered. Abruptly, he pointed to Kiba. "First, lift up your jacket."

Kiba blinked. "Uh, okay..." he grasped the bottom of his black jacket and lifted it up a bit, exposing his protruding, net shirt covered stomach. "Okay, now what?"

"Lift up the net shirt, too," Choji instructed. Still confused, Kiba nonetheless did as he was instructed, exposing his bare stomach to the outside world.

"Ok, Choji, I've done it, but I still don't..." Kiba was cut off as Choji lunged forward, palm pointed outwards. Kiba's cry of shock was choked off his Choji struck his stomach, HARD.

"Oof!" Grunting in pain, Kiba fell back onto the ground, clutching his stomach in pain. Angrily, he glared at his fellow ninja. "Choji, what the hell was that?!"

Shrugging, Choji answered him. "Secret Akimichi jutsu." He held up his palm, showing an odd symbol was drawn upon it. "When I hit your gut, the inside of your stomach was changed a bit. That way, even after you've eaten someone and digested them, their chakra will stay inside your belly." He pointed to his own concealed stomach, indicating that he'd done the same to himself. "Once you're done, all you need to do is draw the symbol I just showed you on the ground, smear a bit of your blood on it, and..." He spread his arms wide. "...Everyone you've eaten will appear, not hurt in the least. Of course, if you're still hungry, you can eat them again, summon them, eat them again, bring them back..."

Kiba, who had been listening to this explanation, had been growing more intrigued, his mouth eventually twisting upwards into a smile. This became a full-on grin once Choji got to the final part.

This was great! He could eat as much as he wanted, and not feel guilty about hurting anyone else!

Laughing, Kiba pulled his net shirt and jacket back down, got up, dusted himself off, and looked at Choji. "Well, when you put it like that..." He smirked. "I'm in!"

Choji laughed heartily. "Great to hear that, Kiba! Now, who do you want to go for first?"

Kiba thought for a minute. "Well..."
13121.title: "Fatten up some of the others, then eat the...

choices: Kiba is able to swallow Konohamaru without trouble
Konohamaru wakes up, panicking when he notices his predicament
131212.content:
"How about that Konohamaru kid?" Kiba suggested. "He's always trying to act like Naruto, so maybe he can eat like him, too."

Choji nodded. "Great idea! He'll be a nice morsel to start us off!" A thoughtful expression came across his face. "How are we gonna get him to fatten himself up, though?"

Kiba raised an eyebrow. "That is actually a good point; I doubt he'd listen to us." He smiled, rummaging around in his pocket. "Good thing I got these." He pulled out fifteen colorful strips of paper.

Choji's eyes widened. "Are those what I think they are?"

Kiba nodded. "Yeah, coupons to Ichiraku's. Each one's good for three extra-large bowls of ramen with the works. If Konohamaru really wants to be like Naruto, he'll go all out!"

Choji smiled broadly, pleased at this turn of events. "By the way, where'd you get these?"

Kiba smirked. "You know that eating contest I was in a while back?"

Choji blinked. "You mean the one Hinata won?"

The dog-nin grimaced. "Yeah, that one. Didn't think she could eat so much and not have it go to her gut..." Kiba shook his head; he was getting off-track. "Anyway, I only got 20 or so bowls down before fainting." He rubbed his stomach absentmindedly. "Got a nice gut there, too." He turned his attention back to the coupons. "Anyway, everyone who didn't win got these as consolation prizes. Of course," Kiba laughed, "Naruto went through his in a day." He laughed again, this time with a slightly derisive tone. "You shoulda seen him, Choji. His jacket was open (the baka's gut probably forced it open while he was eating), his gut was stickin' out from under his shirt, his fly was down and his button was undone..." Kiba paused to take a breath. "And still the idiot was smiling, laying down and rubbing his gut like he didn't have a care in the world..."

"Uh, Kiba?" Choji cut in. It's not that he didn't want to hear about Naruto stuffing himself; in fact, he wouldn't have minded fattening Naruto up as Kiba had described him before swallowing him whole, but he wanted to hear what Kiba had in mind.

"Huh? Oh," Kiba started. "Anyway, I was thinking we could leave these where the kid could find them, keep an eye on him, and just watch how things go from there." Kiba smirked. "And I know just where to leave 'em..."


"Huh?" Konohamaru scratched his head, reaching into his mailbox. He'd just gotten home from another mission (he was beginning to see why Naruto-niichan hated chasing after cats,) and had just been about to go inside when he saw brightly colored strips of paper sticking out of the metal box's side. He grabbed the strips and held them up to his eyes; as he looked at the characters inscribed upon them, his confusion quickly became elation. "Free ramen! All right! I can finally beat Naruto-niichan and eat more ramen than he ever has!" Without pausing to think about why the coupons were in his mailbox in the first place, he darted off.

Choji and Kiba peeked out from the side of a nearby building. Kiba gave a short laugh, a smug look coming across his face. "Step one: completed."




A few minutes later, Konohamaru was sitting at Ichiraku, eating furiously. He was only five bowls in, but already his stomach was starting to take on a slightly rounded appearance. Konohamaru took no notice of this; the minute he was done with his fifth extra-large bowl (about three times larger than a typical one), he set it aside and called loudly for the next one. As he started on his sixth bowl, he failed to notice Kiba and Choji watching from nearby.

Kiba whistled. "Damn, look at that kid go!"

Choji raised his eyebrows. "Wow, he really does eat like Naruto..."

Kiba chuckled. "Like that's bad for us?" He turned to Choji. "C'mon, Choji, let's move a little closer and see how he does." He started off. Choji, all too happy to comply, soon followed.

Ten minutes later, Konohamaru was about 20 bowls in, and he wasn't showing any signs of stopping. From their place next to him, Choji and Kiba watched in growing (ha!) anticipation. They weren't worried about being spotted; the kid was way too engrossed in his ramen to notice anything else. At present, their eyes were trained on the genin's stomach.

Over the past few minutes, they had watched as the boy's belly had grown, increasing slightly in size with every bowl that he finished. At present, it now stuck out a good two inches or so in front of him. The front of his pants had become slightly strained, and his shirt had risen up just enough to show a tiny bit of skin, just above his increasingly strained pants button.

"This is getting good," Choji whispered to his fellow glutton, who smiled in response.

"Yeah, it is. Glad I thought of it." Face lighting up, he turned to Choji. "And just think; he still has 25 bowls to go. He keeps this up, we'll be eating great!"


Unfortunately, it was at this moment that Konohamaru abruptly stopped. Dropping his chopsticks, he groaned, clutching his swollen gut. Teuchi, from his position on the other side of the counter, frowned. "You're looking a little sick there, kid; you wanna take a break? You don't have to eat all the bowls now, you know."

Kiba and Choji grimaced in horror; their plan could go wrong!

Fortunately for the two gluttons, Konohamaru opened his eyes. "N-no! I'm not gonna let Naruto nii-chan eat more than me!" He sat up straight, slamming his hands on the counter. "Bring out the next bowl!"

Teuchi, his face full of unease, nonetheless complied, and his hungry patron resumed eating with fervor. Kiba and Choji breathed a sigh of relief; their plans were still on track!


Twenty bowls later, Konohamaru was still eating. His belly had swollen further, and it showed on his clothes.

His pants button quivered ominously, looking as though it were about to give. His shirt had risen up considerably, exposing more of his growing belly; any higher and his belly button would see the light of day.

Finally finishing his twenty-first bowl, Konohamaru lifted it to his mouth, and tipped it as he proceeded to drink the broth.

Without warning, his button, no longer able to take the strain, shot off with an audible POP! It flew into the bottom of the counter and ricocheted off. Akamaru yelped in alarm as the flying disc shot by his massive head, barely nicking it.

Completely oblivious to this turn of events, Konohamaru continued eating, even as his fly rapidly pried itself open and his stomach, belly button and all, surged forth. When he'd finished his fourty-fourth bowl, his shirt was all but resting on top of the bloated mass that was his stomach.

Panting, he glanced at the final bowl, a look of resignation coming across his face. Teuchi seemed almost relieved, while Kiba and Choji waited with bated breath; could the young ninja do it?

Their question was soon answered. Konohamaru, steeling himself, grabbed the full bowl and tipped its contents, noodles, fixings, and all, down his gullet. Once it was all down, he slammed the bowl onto the counter and leaned back, arms hanging at his sides. Kiba and Choji gazed with barely-contained excitement at his stomach, the bare skin of which was now pressed against the counter, and the size of which forced his shirt to rest completely on top of it, unable to cover it lest it start to rip. Then their eyes wandered to the boy's face. Konohamaru wore a smile of pure contentment and satisfaction, his eyes closed as he breathed deeply. It occurred to the two gluttons that the boy had fallen asleep, moments after finishing the last bowl. Suddenly, another thought occurred to them: this was their chance!

Standing up and assuring Teuchi that they'd carry him home, Kiba and Choji hefted the boy (with some difficulty, owing to his distended belly) between them. They carried him throughout the streets, trying not to notice the baffled looks of the villagers.

Grunting with exertion, Kiba looked up at his fellow ninja, a hopeful expression on his face. "So, uh, Choji, can I take this one?"

Choji looked a bit reluctant, but nodded anyway. "Eh, why not. This is your first people-meal, after all."

Muttering his thanks, Kiba continued to carry the stuffed genin.

It was a few minutes before they reached a secluded field where they could proceed without interruption. They laid the unconscious Konohamaru, watching his stomach (which, blessedly, had shrunk in the least,) rise and fall as he snored.

Kiba gulped. "Alright, Choji, how do I...uh...do this?"

Smiling in understanding, Choji instructed the dog-nin. "Pick him up...no, head first, that'll make it easier... hold him up...ok, now open wide..."

Kiba followed his instructions, picking up the younger boy by his midsection (or at least part of his midsection) and repositioned him so his head was facing towards Kiba. Then, the dog-nin opened his mouth wide, while Akamaru watched, anxious. He really hoped Kiba knew what he was doing...

After one last uncertain look at the Akimichi, Kiba began slowly moving the fattened genin towards his gullet, feeling a shudder come over him as the boy's head entered his mouth....

What happens next?
131212.title: Ramen Coupons+Konohamaru=First Meal!

13122.content:
"We're gonna eat the village out of their food supply," Choji exclaimed, looking hungry and excited. Kiba looked at him, shocked. "You mean we can actually eat all that," he queried, looking in awe as Choji held up a bag full of money he had borrowed from his dad this morning for the very reason of getting bigger. The two grinned hungrily at each other and dashed off to the first restaurant in town.

As they approached it, Kiba unbuttoned his jacket, letting his belly fall free. Choji opted to keep his shirt closed, and see if he couldn't burst it with his own fat later. The first restaurant they approached was a...
13122.title: Eating out the town

choices: "Let's get the same thing, only bigger; that meat was tasty as hell"
131221.content:
The first place that Kiba and Choji hit happened to be Choji's favorite barbecue place. They paid for their seats, then sat down. Kiba smiled. "So, Choji..." he began, looking around the restaurant. "What should we start with?"

Choji looked thoughtful for a minute. "Hmm... let's start with the biggest thing they have, then just keep on ordering until all the food's gone."

Kiba laughed, patting his belly. "Sounds good!" When a waiter came by, they ordered a massive platter of assorted meats. As the waiter went to the kitchen to put the order in, Choji looked at Kiba's belly; his jacket was unbuttoned, but his net shirt still remained, still covering his bloated gut. "Kiba, you sure you don't want to take that off? It might get a little uncomfortable..."

Kiba shrugged. "Ah, it's okay. It'll probably burst by the time we're done here."

Choji laughed to himself. At least Kiba was thinking on the same page as him...

After a few minutes, the raw meat was brought out and placed on the table-grill to cook. It wasn't long before it was done to their satisfaction. Nodding at each other, they went at it.

Kiba ate like a wild animal (somewhat fitting, actually,) shoving both large and small pieces of meat into his mouth and chewing noisily before gulping them down. However, he hadn't forgotten about Akamaru; every third piece he came across, he tossed to his buddy.

Choji ate with a fervor that was equal to, if not greater than, Kiba's. He shoveled meat into his mouth at an alarming pace, only chewing enough to swallow without choking.

In a matter of minutes, both ninjas had finished the meal, and were now lying back and patting their stomachs. Choji's already sizable belly had increased in size, manifesting as a bulge, albeit not as big as Kiba's, against his shirt.

Kiba's stomach had also swelled in size, and was literally just an inch away from pressing against the table. His net shirt had, surprisingly, not burst yet, but it had nonetheless ridden up over his belly, exposing the bare, pink flesh of the stomach and the navel situated at the center of it.

Kiba patted his belly in satisfaction and looked at Choji. "Damn, that was good..." Kiba sighed. Choji, rubbing his own belly through his shirt, just smiled and nodded in return.

"So, Kiba, any ideas on what to get next?" Choji asked his fellow ninja.

Kiba almost looked thoughtful before replying...
131221.title: Teppanyaki place

choices: Naruto comes into the restaurant, with a similar idea to get big
1312211.content:
Kiba finally decided. "Let's get the same thing, only bigger." He paused to smack his exposed belly, causing it to ripple a bit. "That meat tasted great."

Choji nodded. "Hey! Can we get the same meal?" he called out to the waiters. "And add twice as much meat to it!" he added.

It was only a matter of minutes before the massive meal was laid out before them, causing the two prospective gluttons to drool a bit.

Choji wiped his mouth. "Wow, this looks sooo good..." he mumbled in sheer anticipation and bliss. He was right; most of the meat was still sizzling and bubbling with grease, just waiting to be devoured.

Kiba, though he was excited as well, hesitated. "Something wrong, Kiba?" Choji asked.

Kiba laughed. "It's nothing." Even as he said this, he reached down to his waist, fiddling with his pants button before finally getting a good grip on it and unbuttoning it. Almost immediately, his stomach bulged out slightly, finally beginning to press against the table. This also caused his zipper to undo itself slightly, although his pants still remained partially zipped. "Okay, now I'm ready. You ready, boy?" he asked Akamaru. The large dog woofed happily in affirmation.

Choji grabbed a pair of chopsticks, grabbing several pieces of meat with it. "What are we waiting for? Let's eat!"

Kiba needed no second bidding; he set upon the large meal with an unsettling ferocity. The patrons of the restaurant glanced at the two ninjas stuffing themselves noisily, their bellies growing bit by bit.

While they were eating...
1312211.title: Meat redux

131222.content:
Kiba was surprised when Choji led him back to Ichiraku's. He brought this to his comrade's attention. "Choji, weren't we just here yesterday?"

Choji nodded. "Well, you ate so many bowls yesterday, I figured you might like to come back here again. Besides," Choji added, rubbing his stomach in anticipation, "I didn't eat as much as I wanted to yesterday." Of course, Chojij had eaten at least a couple stacks' worth, but that was inconsequential to him.

Kiba blinked, his mouth beginning to rise into a smile. "Well, the ramen yesterday was good..." he conceded, looking towards the eatery. "Let's go; I'm starving!" With this comment, Choji and Kiba quickly made their way to Ichiraku's, pushing up the flap. However, they were in for quite a surprise...

"Naruto?" Kiba asked, upon seeing the blonde ninja sitting on one of the stools, happily eating his ramen (as usual.) Upon hearing Kiba's voice, Naruto turned around. He blinked his eyes in confusion. "Kiba? Choji? What are you guys doing here?"

Laughing, Kiba replied, "What do ya think, idiot? We're hungry." Naruto bristled slightly at the joking insult.

Choji nodded. "This is only our first stop, actually." He chuckled at Naruto's confused expression. "We're gonna eat out the entire town."

A pause. Then...

"WHAAAAT?" Naruto practically yelled, disturbing the ramen shack's owner.

Kiba smirked. "Uh huh. And we're already off to a great start; yesterday, I ate more bowls than I've ever seen you have," he boasted as he gestured at his bloated belly.

Upon hearing this, Naruto's confused expression became determined. "Yeah? Well, I bet I could eat even more! Hey!" he called out. "Give me 10 bowls of miso ramen! And don't stop bringing them out until it's gone!"

Choji and Kiba started at this, even as they took their seats. Naruto sounded really determined, even more so than when he trained... and that was saying something!

Suddenly, Choji had an idea. He whispered something to Naruto, who's face lit up.

"An eating contest?" he exclaimed, beaming as his first few bowls were brought out. "You're on!" He immediately began slurping up his ramen.

Within a short amount of time, Kiba and Choji had ordered their own bowls and were ravenously devouring every bowl brought out to them.

Who wins?
131222.title: The Contest

choices: Lead him someplace secluded and eat him?
Recruit him to help us eat out the town?
1312221.content:
Kiba and Choji ate as fast as they could, but Naruto was at the top of his game that day. For every five bowls that the two prospective gluttons downed, Naruto downed two more. Kiba and Choji did not fail to notice this, and ate even faster, bowls continuing to pile on their side of the counter, but Naruto always managed to stay two bowls ahead, even with Akamaru laying beneath Kiba and Choji to pick off any stray noodles that fell to the ground.

All three were so caught up in trying to stay ahead of one another, they only took peripheral notice of their bellies, slowly growing with the sheer amount of food being ingested. Kiba's already bloated stomach slowly but surely grew even more, forcing his net shirt up and exposing his belly. Choji, feeling an uncomfortable tightness around his stomach, clumsily reached an arm around his back and undid the clasp holding his chestplate to his body, before grabbing the undone straps and tossing the armor behind him. He immediately resumed eating, his already apparent stomach forming an ever-growing bulge under his shirt, the flesh beginning to peek out just a little bit.

Naruto's belly,however, went even further; first, it slowly swelled, pushing against his jacket and forming a rather large bulge. Then, as he continued gorging himself, it grew even further. This, apparently, caused a fair amount of discomfort to Naruto, if his wince was anything to go by. He quickly rectified this by taking one arm (the other still shoveling ramen into his mouth) and unzipping his jacket, revealing his bloated stomach, still covered by his black shirt (bearing the insignia of the Leaf, of course.) This released a good deal of the pressure, causing Naruto to sigh happily before returning to eating in earnest.

Of course, his belly was far from finished. As its owner continued shoveling noodles into his mouth, it expanded more still, causing his shirt to begin rising up. As Naruto's stomach continued growing, more and more of his stomach saw the light of day, until at last his shirt rested firmly on top of the large protrusion. As the ramen started coming slower (due to the shop once again starting to run out of ramen,) it began expanding less noticeably, but still began creating some more pressure on his pants. Naruto, even through his frenzied eating, did not fail to notice this, and used one of his arms to unbutton and unzip his pants. The release of pressure did two things; it made Naruto once again sigh happily, and caused his stomach to bulge out, no longer under restraint.

Soon, the last bowl had been consumed, and the three stuffed ninja began running a tally of their bowls.

"I've got 34 bowls," Kiba called, leaning back and placing his hands on his stomach. "Hell yeah."

"I ate 39," Choji announced, smacking his stomach, a decent amount of which was now visible.

They both looked at Naruto, who was serenely leaning back and massaging his belly with both hands. Suddenly, his eyes shot open and called out his number, to the dismay of both of his fellow ninja:

"62!" The blonde ninja laughed, before noticing something about Kiba. "Hey, Kiba, your pants look a little tight. You wanna do something about that?"

At first, Kiba frowned angrily at this, but then felt the tightness around his waistline. Mumbling a reluctant thanks, he reached both hands down and undid his pants, causing his stomach to bulge, much as Naruto's had done.

Satisfied, Naruto returned to rubbing his stomach, smiling at the soothing sensations and ocassionally rubbing a couple of fingers over his belly button.

Kiba laid back, rubbing his own belly in much the same fashion, but not paying much attention to the feeling, pleasurable as it was. "I got beaten again," Kiba thought, making a disgruntled face. "I thought I could eat more than that..."

He was startled by someone nudging his side. Blinking, he turned to Choji, who was also rubbing his belly, but with only one arm.

"Kiba, may it's not so bad that we lost." Choji reassured him, placing a hand on the dog-nin's shoulder.

Kiba, clearly confused, simply stared back. "What do ya mean?"

"I mean," Choji replied, gesturing discreetly at Naruto, "Is that we could use this to our advantage. I mean, look how big Naruto's belly's gotten. He ate more than either of us. So, what do you say we..."
1312221.title: Naruto

choices: They admit to Naruto what they want to do
13122211.content:
"...lead him someplace private and eat him?" Choji whispered to Kiba.

Kiba thought about this for a moment. He glanced at Naruto, still massaging his stuffed gut and grinning. Against his will, Kiba found himself licking his lips. The size of Naruto's belly...the way its smooth surface expanded and contracted with each breath...having that inside of his own belly...

Suddenly, a thought cut through Kiba's longing observations. "Wait a sec, Choji; How are we both gonna eat him?"

The portly ninja thought this out. "Huh. You do have a point, Kiba..."

Suddenly, Choji had a thought of his own. "Actually, there's a way we can both eat him... and we can do it for days!" Choji looked absolutely ecstatic about this prospect, much to Kiba's confusion.

"Choji? What do you..." He didn't even finish the sentence before realization struck him. "Oh yeah, his Shadow Clone Technique!" Kiba smiled slightly, which grew even more as he realized the implications: tens, dozens, maybe even hundreds of Narutos, each with engorged bellies, sliding down his throat and into his stomach...

That was it; it was decided. "Wait here for a second, Choji." Getting up from his seat, he made his way over to Naruto (he did so with some difficulty, due to his incredibly stuffed belly). Taking a deep breath, Kiba made his move. "Hey, Naruto?"

Naruto stopped massaging his gut to look up at Kiba. "What is it?"

Kiba groaned inwardly at Naruto's blank look, before shooting a glance at Choji. "Me and Choji found something really cool earlier. You wanna come see it with us?"

Immediately, Naruto's eyes brightened. "Sure! How cool is it?"

Kiba shared a sly look with Choji. "Trust us, it'll blow your mind."

That did it for Naruto. With speed surprising for one so stuffed, he leapt to his feet, his stomach shaking as he did so. "I'm in!"

"Good," Kiba replied, grinning. He gestured to the left, without any real destination in mind. "It's this way..."

That was enough for Naruto; steeling his body, he took his first running step...

Only to stop short, as his own belly, even more swelled than Kiba's, stopped him, causing him to stumble. His stomach shook again, the mass of exposed flesh rippling as Naruto tripped and desperately tried to regain his balance.

Kiba and Choji watched their fellow bloated ninja with increasing interest as he regained his balance, lost it, got it back, and lost it again. This was gonna be good...

Later...
13122211.title: Lead him someplace secluded and eat him?

1312222.content: Which of the two fatties win? the dog-like Kiba, or the hoggish Choji?
1312222.title: Kiba and/or Choji

choices: Naruto outate Kiba, he does love his ramen!
13122221.content:
Burping with a thunderously deep rumble, the fattest young ninja in town smiled and leaned back as his chair creaked, barely containing the huge amount of ramen the boy had ingested. rubbing his gut, Choji laughs and asks, "so, you two enjoy yourselves?"

"how did you do that?" Naruto moaned, rubbing his swollen belly, sloshing with the food crammed in it.

nodding Kiba added, "you practically ate as much as both of us combined! I can't believe it! Congrats!" the rounded ninja chuckled and patted his friend's belly, which rested on the table in front of him.

"so which of you lightweights got second? I can't see 'cause of my stuffed gut!" Choji laughed.
13122221.title: Choji Wins!

choices: "Sure! You've got what it takes to eat out the town"
131222212.content:
Naruto laughed, his recently engorged belly shaking as he did so. "Sorry, dog breath, but it looks like I beat you-again!"

Kiba frowned, looking down at his own belly; it had swelled considerably, enough to begin tearing his net shirt, but still smaller than his friend's. Naruto's belly, he noticed, had swelled enough to pry his jacket open. Also, from the looks of things, it was just barely staying under his shirt, while pressing against his still-buttoned pants.

Naruto continued laughing. "Yeah, after all these years, you still can't beat-"

He stopped suddenly, descending into silence.

Alarmed, Choji looked over at him (or tried to.) "Naruto, are you okay?!"

No sooner did he say this than an audible POP sound in the air; at the same time, his pants came undone, the button blasting into the ground at his feet. His fly, subsequently, abruptly unzippered, allowing his stomach to flop out, no longer constrained by the tight article of clothing. This caused his shirt to slide up, exposing a sufficient amount of skin to show his belly button and a couple inches or so of skin above it.

Naruto let out a deep sigh. "Ohhh... that feels better." Turning to Kiba, he spoke.

"So, Kiba, mind if I join you guys?"

What does Kiba say?
131222212.title: Naruto: 2nd place!

1312222121.content:
"If you can out-eat me, then you're as good as in," he exclaimed, though dissapointed in himself for loosing like that. All three of the ninja sported large bellies now, Chouji's the biggest, with Naruto in second. "Hm... Where should we head next then, guys," Chouji asked, clearly still hungry for more, as a true glutton always is. "Well, there's a new Ramen stand down the way..." Naruto said, stroking his belly. Kiba and Chouji nodded, and the three waddled on over to the stand.

As they reached it, Chouji got an idea. "Hey, lets just take as much as we can to go, and head back to one of our houses! Which one of you has the most food? I'd say myself but my dad's home and he might get angry at us eating up all his food," he said. Naruto shot his hand up excitedly. "I just bought a whole ton of food after the payoff of my last misson," he said, "We can go to my house!" The other two seemed to be in agreement, so they bought as much ramen as they could carry and made their way to Naruto's house. When they got there, they had two options.
1312222121.title: A third member

13122222.content:
"Oh man... I never thought I could eat so much..." Kiba groaned, hands massaging his bloated stomach, which had ripped through his net shirt and now stuck out into the open. He smiled at the dozens of bowls stacked on his part of the counter. "But I won!"

Choji and Naruto groaned from their parts of the counter. Their stomachs were bloated, as well, but less so than Kiba's; they each had eaten 3 or 4 bowls less than the dog-nin had.

Naruto moaned. "Geez, Kiba... How did you eat so much?" He rubbed his own exposed stomach, sticking out from under his shirt and jacket that had, miraculously, not been forced open.

Choji sighed happily, rubbing his food-stuffed gut; he had eaten about the same amount of ramen as Naruto. "Yeah, you didn't give any to Akamaru, did you?" he joked.

Kiba laughed, noticing offhand how tightly his still-buttoned pants were constricting his belly. "Nah, that was all me!" He turned his head and looked down at his companion, smiling. "I asked the cook to make Akamaru a few bowls of his own ramen." He patted the large dog, who was laying sleepily near four empty ramen bowls. "You like that, boy?" Akamaru raised his head tiredly, barking in reply and wagging his tail.

Kiba grinned, ruffling the dog's fur. "Yeah, that was good, wasn't it?" He looked at his fellow ninja. "Well, Choji, ya think we better get going?"

Choji nodded. "Yeah, let's go. There's a whole village just waiting to be eaten out!"

Putting a friendly hand on Choji's shoulder, Kiba stood up. Something occured to him, and he looked at Naruto, who was still sitting down, now simply resting his hands on the exposed, rounded mass of flesh that was his stomach. "You can come along too, Naruto; we could always use the help." Naruto, too purely content to reply, simply smiled and nodded.

Kiba smirked as Akamaru got up. "Well, let's go!" He yawned and stretched his arms.

He let out a startled noise as the action pushed his pants button to the limit, which came flying off with a loud POP.

Kiba blushed, rubbing the back of his head. "Heh... sorry about that." He grimaced as he looked at the detached button, which had now landed in one of the chef's pots. "Ah well, it was bound to happen sooner or later." With that matter settled, he turned to both of his fellow gluttons.

"So, where to now?"
13122222.title: Kiba wins!

choices: A big fat Naruto for Choji, and a bigger Sasuke for Kiba
Garra is in town, and bigger, along with Neji...
1313.content:
"...you," Kiba exclaimed, a little look of hunger in his eyes as Choji realized that Kiba was not admiring his flab so much as he was sizing Choji up, though Choji had been right about wishing he was as big as him...

"N..now hold on Kiba..." Choji started, fearing for his life,"Let's think about this.. eat me..? When I could help you out getting more meals? I mean, I've considered it before too.. and I have been looking a little thin lately," he said, hefting his belly and weighing its mass.

Kiba pondered this, curious as to what he should do. "Hmm.. I... guess I could let you go.. if we go eat NOW. And you better stay ahead of the me, fatty. I need some inspiration to keep getting bigger, y'know," Kiba said, his soon to be bigger belly growling. "Now then, Choji, who should be on the menu? I know how big people around the vilage are getting.. I've been a tad jealous that I'm left behind...," Kiba asked, looking starved.

Choji responded with...
1313.title: Hungry for fat ninja!

14.content: Big stuffed meals for the fatties! Fill up their prey with all the food they can find, THEN down them and turn them into flab! So how big will our favorite ninjas start off?
14.title: Food-filled ninja meals

info.brief_description: Choji and Kiba from Naruto go on a fattening adventure!
info.description:
No abnormal means of gain, meaning only food and vore.

And no strange vore forms, either. Oral only. If things get desperate and you need to bring back a character as a meal or something, you may you regeneration.

No gasses, potions, fattening fluids, and ESPECIALLY no slob. No farting or burping or anything sick like that. Keep it clean, people.

Other than that, enjoy, and keep it going as long as possible!
info.pretty_title: Choji and Kiba weight gain and vore
